episodes.title: Apocalyptic Sex Cult EXPOSED
episodes.description: Investigative journalist Jennings Brown exposes the dark secrets of a mysterious sex cult and digital cults across the world. Join us as we dive deep into his explosive revelations, exploring the cult’s manipulation tactics, psychological control, and the fight for justice. WELCOME TO CAMP! 🏕️ JOIN S'MORE CAMP INNER SANCTUM HERE: https://camp.beehiiv(dot)com/ THANK YOU WHOOP Visit Join(dot)Whoop(dot)com/Camp for a ONE MONTH FREE TRIAL with Promo Code: CAMP THANK YOU KETONE Save 30% off your first subscription order &receive a free six pack of Ketone-IQ at Ketone(dot)com/CAMPGAGNON THANK YOU PRIZEPICKS Visit Prizepicks(dot)com/Camp PROMO CODE: CAMP Production, intro and edit: Brandon Raymond 00:00 Intro 1:17 Background and profession 2:30 Infiltrating a doomsday sex cult 6:43 What makes a cult? Reaching out + Arriving 13:29 First visit + Who’s the leader & Prominent members 22:00 Preparing for the doomsday + Meeting the Leader 31:20 Cognitive Dissonance + Sunk cost fallacy 36:03 Wanting this to be true? Next time in 2025 38:04 Hearing rumours about s3x rituals 44:59 Releasing podcast + Corroborating stories 47:12 “Love Fests” + hostility towards homosexuality 1:04:57 Police interest, Lawsuits + Age of consent 1:11:35 Close to the leader + Incredible wine 1:15:47 Tithing 1:17:24 They infiltrated Google? 1:20:19 Did you ever feel in danger? 1:26:23 Who is Teal Swan? Online pipeline 1:38:07 New cult targeting mothers 1:54:51 Black mail used to stop people leaving 1:59:00 Power of language 2:02:33 Memory manipulation 2:05:29 How did women get out? 2:10:00 How many digital cults out there? 2:11:25 What can you do? 2:22:37 What’s the motivation for Cult Leaders? 2:29:33 Red flags, loneliness & 1st Amendment
